General.Name: Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk engages in the pilotage, towage, mooring, sea transportation, and ship operation business in Indonesia. The company provides sea port service activities, domestic sea transportation, river and lake transportation, domestic sea freight, and overseas liner sea freight services, as well as fleet management services. It offers warehousing and storage, general machine repair services, cargo handling, as well as repair of ships, boats, and floating buildings. PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. The company operates as a subsidiary of PT. Pelabuhan Indonesia II.
